statements.select: select * from ProduceOtherInDepotDetail where ProduceOtherInDepotId in(select ProduceOtherInDepotId from ProduceOtherInDepot where ProduceOtherInDepotDate between #startdate# and #enddate#) and (ProduceOtherCompactId >=#startpronoteid# or #startpronoteid# is null) and (ProduceOtherCompactId <=#endpronoteid# or #endpronoteid# is null)

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherInDepotDetail WHERE ProduceOtherInDepotId=#indepotId# AND ProductId IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (Id>=#productId1# OR #productId1# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#productId2# OR #productId2# IS NULL))
